Directions: In a skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Add noodles, corn, soups, sour cream, pimientos, salt and pepper; mix well. Transfer to a greased 3-qt. baking dish. Toss bread crumbs and butter; sprinkle over casserole. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 30 minutes or until heated through.
Ingredients: 6 ounces egg noodles, cooked and drained
1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
